predicate.note: Frames file for 'encapsulate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Under the plan , the companies will use Calgene 's patented technology [*-1] to encapsulate microbes such as Bacillus subtilis , a bacterium , [*-2] to enhance their biological activity against plant diseases .
